refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: ExactImage is a fast C++ image processing library. Unlike many other library frameworks it allows operation in several color spaces and bit depths natively, resulting in low memory and computational requirements.

refsection.title: File formats
refsection.para:
ExactImage supports the following file formats:
BMP
Digital camera RAW
GIF
JPEG
JPEG2000
OpenEXR
PNG
PBM
RAW
TIFF
XPM
SVG (read-only, partial support)
PDF (write-only, allows embedding JPEG and JPEG2000, vector geometry and fonts, and writing multiple pages)
PostScript (write-only, allows embedding JPEG)
Encapsulated PostScript (write-only, allows embedding JPEG)
PCX
Targa, TGA
